title: Tom Daley accused of 'secret affair with male model while fiance Dustin Lance Black was away'
text:

Tom Daley has been hit by allegations he had a 'secret 18-month affair with a male model' while fiancé Dustin Lance Black was out of the country. 
The Olympic diver has been accused of meeting up with the British model in London while Oscar winning screenwriter Dustin - known as Lance to friends - was out of town. 
A source alleged to The Sun on Sunday that Tom, 21, met the model when they bumped into each other on the street by chance. 
The model was then invited to a barbecue with Tom and Lance, 42, and their friends, before meeting the famous couple together for coffee. But the insider alleges that Tom later invited the model to visit him while Lance was away, sent saucy text messages, and things turned steamy. 
The model is reported to have told friends it was “a purely physical relationship with not much emotion involved” and “Tom was very confident and forward with a huge sex drive.” 
“It would always happen when Dustin was away and would be quite short-lived. They would hook up for half an hour or an hour and that would be it,” alleged the source. 
The Sun alleges that the rumoured 'affair' was an 'open secret among sections of the local gay community.' 
The alleged affair ended in 2015, according to the friend. 
Mirror Celebs has contacted Tom’s reps for comment. Neither Tom nor Lance have addressed the claims on social media. Olympic medallist Tom and Lance, who won an Academy Award for writing the biopic Milk, announced their engagement in October 2015, after a two-year relationship. 
They first met at a mutual friend’s dinner in Los Angeles; while Lance knew who Tom was, the diver has admitted he didn’t know who Lance was but was immediately attracted to him. 
Tom typed his number into Lance’s phone and they began talking the next day. 
“Quite honestly, we talked about marriage within the first two weeks after seeing each other the first time in LA,” Tom told Out magazine last year. “That was the weird thing: that it came up in conversation so many times. I always knew it was going to happen at some point.” Tom proposed to Lance at home (Photo: Getty) They announced their engagement in The Times newspaper (Photo: Getty) Read More Tom Daley says he talked about marrying fiancé Dustin Lance Black in the first month they met 
Lance added: “We were so busy making all these plans — we both wanted to have children; we both wanted to build a home of our own someday… Marriage is the foundation to all of these other big plans we have. So we knew we were going to get engaged — it was just a matter of when, and who does it.” 
They have spoken about both wanting to propose to each other; they both secretly got rings and talked to each other’s loved ones - but it was Tom who got down on one knee first. 
“I had the ring box in my underwear, and when he came out of the bathroom, I just went down on my knee and proposed,” recalled Tom. “Then he ran off to the bathroom to get his rings, and he had this whole speech prepared, but he’s a writer so his was quite extravagant. Like us on Facebook
